member.name: T:WSA.Foundation.General.iOS.ApplicationInfo
member.summary: Class contains definition for Application Info methods.

member.name: M:WSA.Foundation.General.iOS.ApplicationInfo.GetAppVersion
member.summary: Returns the application version including the alpha version.
member.remarks: This is for the App database migration.

member.name: M:WSA.Foundation.General.iOS.ApplicationInfo.GetDeviceName
member.summary: Returns the device type.
member.returns: Vendor Name and model number of the device.

member.name: M:WSA.Foundation.General.iOS.ApplicationInfo.GetOsName
member.summary: Returns the operating system name.
member.returns: Name of Android installed in the device.

member.name: M:WSA.Foundation.General.iOS.ApplicationInfo.GetOsVersion
member.summary: Returns the operating system version.
member.returns: Version of Android installed on the device.

member.name: M:WSA.Foundation.General.iOS.ApplicationInfo.GetVersion
member.summary: Returns the application version.
member.remarks: This is for the App version update check.
